item.description:
Girls Night Out – Bracelets

Come join us for this months project, Stackable Stretchy Bracelets. Our staff will be on hand to demonstrate techniques and share tips. You will have the opportunity to make one or as many bracelets as you choose in a comfortable atmosphere while sipping a glass of wine or your favorite beverage. Bring along a friend or make some new ones. Don’t be shy.

Date: Friday, November 6 from 6:00pm-7:30pm
Duration: Open House, come and go as you please
Cost: $10 plus materials

To register please call Abeille at 617.232.4343

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Girls Night Out – Bracelets
